title: Does Typing Speed Actually Matter for Programmers?
description: Coding is mostly thinking, right? We explore why typing speed is still a crucial factor for developer productivity.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
The Bottleneck Argument

While we spend time thinking, when the solution comes, we want to implement it before we lose the train of thought.

Flow State

Slow typing breaks flow. Being able to type code as fast as you think it keeps you in the zone.

RSI Reduction

Faster typists usually have better technique, leading to less strain over a career.
